swipes.headline: Private session at Acquisition.com's Vegas HQ
swipes.primaryText:
We're hosting a private session at Acquisition.com's Las Vegas HQ to show entrepreneurs the exact methods we use to scale businesses.

Want to be in the room?

Click below to see if you're a fit.

swipes.notes: Exclusivity angle (private session, Vegas HQ). Qualifying language (see if you're a fit). Short, direct copy.
swipes.whyItWorks: Creates exclusivity and scarcity. Positions as invitation not pitch. Qualification = premium positioning.

swipes.headline: Are you struggling to scale?
swipes.primaryText:
**Are you struggling to scale?**

To scale, you need one of these three things:
1. Better advertising and sales processes to get more customers
2. Increased customer value to afford more advertising and sales
3. More people to help keep up with demand

The good news? We've designed a Scaling Roadmap that teaches how to solve these constraints.

And we've personalized it for your business.

We're confident it can help you break through to the next level.

Just answer a few questions and we'll send it to you for free.
swipes.notes: Problem-aware hook. Framework presentation (3 things). Personalization angle. Free lead magnet.
swipes.whyItWorks: Opens with pain point. Provides framework = authority. Personalized = high perceived value.

swipes.headline: Investors don't buy businesses with key man risk
swipes.primaryText:
Here's a hard truth: investors don't buy businesses that can't survive without the founder.

It doesn't matter how much revenue you do.

If every decision, every client, and every fire comes back to you, the value of your company is close to zero.

That's key man risk. And until you solve it, you don't have an asset. You have a liability.

We've built systems inside our portfolio companies to remove founder dependency and create businesses that actually scale‚Ä¶ and sell.

That's what we teach, hands-on, at our Scaling Workshop in Vegas.

If you want to build something that outlives you, click below and let's talk.
swipes.cta: Learn How to Scale Your Business
swipes.notes: Hard truth opening = pattern interrupt. Contrarian take. Asset vs liability reframe. Future-pacing (outlives you).
swipes.whyItWorks: Challenges assumption about revenue. Creates urgency around exit strategy. Positions workshop as solution.

swipes.headline: Get started for FREE üî• Unlock the 14-Day Trial

üëâ Join 171.9k community builders collectively earning over $1 billion per year on the Skool platform TODAY.

‚úÖ Access to Skoolers: A thriving community of creators and entrepreneurs openly sharing what works
‚úÖ Training: Skool 101, Alex Hormozi's $100M Money Models training, plus weekly updates

After your trial, it's just $9/month for Hobby or $99/month for Premium.
swipes.notes: Clear feature stack with checkmarks. Price anchoring ($9 and $99). Hormozi name drop for credibility.
swipes.whyItWorks: Shows exactly what you get. Low entry price reduces friction. Established authority association.

swipes.headline: Tony Robbins X Alex Hormozi - What does the mentor's mentor say?
swipes.primaryText:
Tony Robbins X Alex Hormozi - What does the mentors, mentors, mentor‚Ä¶

Say about setting goals?

Tony Robbins, who recently sat down to give some advice or mentorship to Alex Hormozi‚Ä¶ had a mentor.

Jim Rohn.

Who also had a mentor, named Mr Shoaf.

Mr Shoaf, said to Jim Rohn:
"Set the kind of goals that would make something of you to achieve them."

There is nothing better than a goal that requires you to Self-Actualize.

This is the reason why setting a goal of hitting $20K a month as a closer‚Ä¶

Is simply not what I teach inside my Unicorn Closer Mastermind.

Set goals, like earning $100K a month in commissions, like 5 Unicorn Closers have already achieved‚Ä¶

Because of who it requires you to become in the process.

This is Self-Actualized Selling.
swipes.notes: Authority stacking (Robbins ‚Üí Hormozi ‚Üí Rohn ‚Üí Shoaf). Aspirational identity play. Contrarian goal-setting angle.
swipes.whyItWorks: Borrowed authority from big names. Challenges conventional goals. Identity-based transformation sell.

swipes.headline: Download Free Scaling Frameworks
swipes.primaryText:
Business Owners ‚Äì real quick ‚Äì can I get your email?

I want to send you the exact frameworks we've used to scale:

‚Ä¢ Sales

‚Ä¢ Communication

These are the same systems we implement across our portfolio companies, and you can get them‚Äîfor free.

But that's just the beginning.

These frameworks are only a fraction of what we cover in our Scaling Workshop.

Our two-day intensive at our headquarters includes:

- Day 2: Group sessions with our leadership team to help you apply it

You'll leave with a clear, actionable plan to scale every function of your business.

swipes.headline: If your business can't run without you...
swipes.primaryText:
If your business can't run without you, you don't own a business. You own a job with overhead.

You can't step away. You can't sell. You can't scale.

The moment you stop working, the whole thing grinds to a halt.

That's called key man risk, and it's the single biggest reason most businesses never make it past the founder.

At our Scaling Workshop in Vegas, we help entrepreneurs learn the strategies that take them from 'founder-dependent jobs' into real businesses.

Systems. Teams. Processes. The things that free you from being the bottleneck.

Click the link, book a call, and let's make your business work without you.
swipes.notes: Strong contrarian opener. Reframes business as 'job with overhead'. Exit strategy angle. Vegas positioning.
swipes.whyItWorks: Pattern interrupt statement. Identifies hidden problem (key man risk). Future-paces freedom.

HYROS is the dominant tracking solution for coaching courses, and education.

Your course ads will simply make more.

Guaranteed.

swipes.primaryText:
When peak accuracy matters top brands chose HYROS AI attribution.

Proven to increase ad ROI by at least 15% (or you don't pay).
swipes.notes: Social proof (top brands). AI positioning. Risk reversal (don't pay if no results).
swipes.whyItWorks: Premium positioning via 'top brands'. Guarantee eliminates objection. AI = cutting edge.

swipes.headline: Don't call yourself a Coach
swipes.primaryText:
Don't call yourself a Coach.

You might be thinking. 'But, that's what I do‚Ä¶'

Fair, but just hear me out.

If you've been around as long as I have you'd know the word 'coach' is thrown around so much that it's become a good title for people who don't know what the HELL they are doing but they want to charge for it.

Life coach, business coach, health coach, sex coach, chat-gpt coach (coming soon üôÇ)‚Ä¶

Picture this for me.

You are talking to a good prospect and when she ask you what you do you say:
'I'm A life coach'

What will they think?

Chances are they will start comparing you with other life coaches.

A dime a dozen these days.

So, is there a better way?

Yes.

In the video below, I'll show you a powerful way to make yourself unique in the market.

It works regardless what type of coach you are.
swipes.notes: Contrarian opener challenges identity. Humor (chat-gpt coach). Story-based scenario. Promise of differentiation.
swipes.whyItWorks: Pattern interrupt on coach identity. Validates frustration with crowded market. Video promises solution.

swipes.headline: How Kajabi Users Are Boosting Sales by 30%+ with SamCart
swipes.primaryText:
If you're currently using Kajabi, I bet you didn't know that the average person using Kajabi makes nearly 4X less than the average person on SamCart.

But it's true. üòÆ

Now, you might be wondering, "How is that possible?"

It's simple.

SamCart is laser-focused on optimizing for conversion and making you more money. That's it.

Kajabi, on the other hand, wears a lot of hats. It's an "all-in-one" platform.

And while that might sound convenient, it often means that no single feature is truly optimized for maximum performance.

We fully integrate with Kajabi, so nothing else in the process changes OTHER than the fact that you make more money.

We are so confident in our CheckoutOS system that if SamCart doesn't beat your Kajabi page and generate a higher conversion, you don't pay a cent.
swipes.notes: Competitor comparison (Kajabi). 4X income claim. Specialist vs generalist positioning. Zero-risk guarantee.
swipes.whyItWorks: Bold comparative claim grabs attention. Integration angle = no switching cost. Guarantee removes objection.

swipes.headline: Kajabi, Teachable, Go High Level are like BLANK CANVASES
swipes.primaryText:
Kajabi, Teachable, Go High Level, and similar platforms are like BLANK CANVASES.

They require months of work to build every funnel, landing page, email, and backend system.

And if you're not a marketing expert, your course might still not sell.

After selling over $25,000,000 in courses online, and $5,000,000 of that on Kajabi alone, I realized course creators need a faster, more effective solution.

Enter Course Creator 360 ‚Äì the ultimate All-In-One platform for creating, marketing, and selling your online course.

It's pre-loaded with proven frameworks, systems, and education for websites, webinars, email nurture sequences, sales processes, and lead gen funnels.

Forget generic templates. Get the PROVEN systems we've used to sell 8 figures in courses over the last 6 years.
swipes.notes: Competitor critique (blank canvas metaphor). Massive credibility ($25M in courses). Pre-built vs DIY positioning.
swipes.whyItWorks: Names competitors directly. Massive proof ($25M). Solution = done-for-you vs blank canvas.

swipes.headline: Most coaches write one email and wonder why no one bites
swipes.primaryText:
Most coaches write one email and wonder why no one bites.‚Å†

We write five‚Ä¶ and turn inboxes into income.‚Å†

Here's the deal:‚Å†
One good idea = five banging emails.‚Å†
Same message. Different angles. Zero snooze.‚Å†

1Ô∏è‚É£ Problem ‚Äì "This hurts. Wanna fix it?"‚Å†
2Ô∏è‚É£ Proof ‚Äì "Meet Bob. He fixed it."‚Å†
3Ô∏è‚É£ Philosophy ‚Äì "Most people think X. They're wrong. Here's why."‚Å†
4Ô∏è‚É£ Plan ‚Äì "Here's my 5-step path out."‚Å†
5Ô∏è‚É£ Pitch ‚Äì "I'm doing a thing. Wanna come?"‚Å†

That's it.‚Å†
Five flavours. One message.‚Å†
Drip. Drip. Booked.‚Å†

If you want to turn your next idea into a campaign that actually converts‚Äîwe should talk.
swipes.notes: Framework teaching (5 email types). Conversational tone. 'Drip. Drip. Booked.' = memorable tagline.
swipes.whyItWorks: Gives away valuable framework. Memorable structure. Positions expertise through teaching.

swipes.headline: Every coach ever: 'Pick a niche.' Me: 'You're doing it sideways.'
swipes.primaryText:
Every coach ever: "Pick a niche."‚Å†
‚Å†
Me: "Cool. But you're doing it sideways."‚Å†
‚Å†
Most coaches think niche means choosing a market‚Äîlike gyms, or dentists, or underwater basket-weavers.‚Å†
‚Å†
But inside every market? There's a vertical stack of humans.‚Å†
‚Å†
Bleeding. Sleeping. Stable. Leading.‚Å†
‚Å†
Pick the wrong level, and everything feels like a grind‚Äîslow sales, slower results, and too much effort for too little progress.‚Å†
‚Å†
Pick the right level? Sales click. Clients win faster. You charge more and deliver less (in the best way).‚Å†
‚Å†
üìâ Pain vs üìà Progress. That's the real niche nobody talks about.‚Å†
‚Å†
Don't go sideways. Go deep.‚Å†
‚Å†
Let me know in the comments what level your clients are at‚ÄîBleeding, Sleeping, Stable, or Leading.
swipes.notes: Contrarian take on niche advice. Unique framework (Bleeding/Sleeping/Stable/Leading). Engagement CTA (comment).
swipes.whyItWorks: Challenges common advice. New framework = thought leadership. Comment engagement boosts reach.

swipes.headline: Comment the word BINGE and I'll help you fix your content mistake
swipes.primaryText: Comment the word BINGE and I'll help you fix your content mistake.
swipes.notes: Ultra-short copy. Comment-trigger CTA. Creates curiosity (what mistake?). ManyChat-style automation.
swipes.whyItWorks: Minimal friction to engage. Word trigger starts automation. Curiosity hook.

swipes.headline: I put all my skill points into charisma
swipes.primaryText:
I put all my skill points into charisma.‚Å†
‚Å†
Zero left for spreadsheets.‚Å†
‚Å†
Somehow‚Ä¶ eight figures unlocked.‚Å†
‚Å†
Moral of the story: stop trying to be well-rounded.‚Å†
‚Å†
Find your one unfair advantage and max it out.‚Å†
‚Å†
(Also: hire people who enjoy Excel. I do not.)
swipes.notes: Gaming reference (skill points). Self-deprecating humor. 8-figure credibility. Hire to weakness advice.
swipes.whyItWorks: Relatable for non-analytical types. Permission to lean into strengths. Humor + credibility combo.

Keep Believing & Never Settle

swipes.whyItWorks: Brunson endorsement = instant credibility. Proprietary method differentiates. Interview format = third-party validation.
